```css
:root {
  /* Colors */
  --color-bg-main: #000000;
  --color-bg-deep: #0a0a0a;
  --color-bg-soft: #121212;
  --color-glass: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  --color-glass-strong: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-border-soft: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  --color-border-strong: rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.6);
  --color-primary: #00c853;
  --color-primary-soft: #00e676;
  --color-primary-alt: #64dd17;
  --color-primary-neon: #00ff88;
  --color-text-main: #f5f5f5;
  --color-text-muted: #a3a3a3;
  --color-error: #ff5252;

  /* Typography */
  --font-main: "Inter", system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI",
    sans-serif;
  --font-accent: "Montserrat", system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,
    "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
  --font-size-base: 16px;

  /* Layout */
  --container-width: 1120px;
  --section-padding-y: 4rem;
  --radius-lg: 1.5rem;
  --radius-md: 1rem;
  --radius-full: 999px;

  /* Effects */
  --shadow-soft: 0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  --shadow-neon: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4);
  --blur-strong: 18px;
  --blur-soft: 12px;

  /* Animation */
  --transition-fast: 0.18s ease-out;
  --transition-med: 0.28s ease-out;
}

*,
*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body.page {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
  font-family: var(--font-main);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  background: radial-gradient(circle at top, #121212, #000000 45%, #000000)
    fixed;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
}

img {
  max-width: 100%;
  display: block;
}

button,
input,
textarea {
  font: inherit;
}

a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}

/* Page layout */

.page__skip-link {
  position: absolute;
  left: -999px;
  top: 0.5rem;
  background: var(--color-bg-soft);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  z-index: 1000;
}

.page__skip-link:focus {
  left: 0.75rem;
  outline: 1px solid var(--color-primary);
}

.section {
  padding: var(--section-padding-y) 1.25rem;
}

.section__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.section__header {
  margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  text-align: left;
}

.section__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.04em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.section__subtitle {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

/* Glass effect */

.glass {
  background: var(--color-glass);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border-soft);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-soft);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.glass::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.16),
    transparent 55%
  );
  opacity: 0.3;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.glass--strong {
  background: var(--color-glass-strong);
}

.glass--soft {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
}

@supports ((backdrop-filter: blur(12px)) or (-webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px))) {
  .glass {
    backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-soft));
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-soft));
  }

  .glass--strong {
    backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-strong));
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-strong));
  }
}

/* Header & navigation */

.header {
  position: fixed;
  inset: 0 0 auto;
  z-index: 900;
  padding: 0.7rem 0.75rem 0.9rem;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.header__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0.35rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.75);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.24);
  box-shadow: 0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.header__logo {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.55rem;
}

.header__logo-mark {
  width: 1.85rem;
  height: 1.85rem;
  border-radius: 0.65rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 30% 10%,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  color: #000;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.header__logo-text {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.header__burger {
  border: none;
  background: transparent;
  width: 2.5rem;
  height: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.25rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
}

.header__burger::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.header__burger-line {
  width: 1.2rem;
  height: 2px;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: linear-gradient(
    90deg,
    var(--color-primary),
    var(--color-primary-neon)
  );
  transition: transform var(--transition-fast), opacity var(--transition-fast),
    translate var(--transition-fast);
}

.header__burger-line:nth-child(2) {
  width: 0.85rem;
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(1) {
  transform: translateY(3px) rotate(45deg);
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(2) {
  transform: translateY(-3px) rotate(-45deg);
  width: 1.2rem;
}

.nav {
  position: fixed;
  inset: auto 0 0;
  transform: translateY(100%);
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: opacity var(--transition-med), transform var(--transition-med);
}

.nav--open {
  transform: translateY(0);
  opacity: 1;
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.nav__list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0.3rem 1.25rem 1rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.nav__item {
  flex: 1;
}

.nav__link {
  display: inline-flex;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0.45rem 0.25rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background var(--transition-fast),
    border-color var(--transition-fast), transform var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast);
}

.nav__link--active {
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.25),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95)
  );
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.nav__icon {
  width: 1.7rem;
  height: 1.7rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.nav__icon svg {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  fill: var(--color-text-main);
}

.nav__link--active .nav__icon svg {
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

/* Buttons */

.button {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.35rem;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  background: rgba(18, 18, 18, 0.95);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.04em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  transition: transform var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast),
    border-color var(--transition-fast);
}

.button::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  padding: 1px;
  background: linear-gradient(
    120deg,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.9),
    rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.3),
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.9)
  );
  -webkit-mask:
    linear-gradient(#000 0 0) content-box,
    linear-gradient(#000 0 0);
  -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
  mask-composite: exclude;
  opacity: 0.8;
}

.button--primary {
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  color: #000;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.button--ghost {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
}

.button--full {
  width: 100%;
}

.button:hover,
.button:focus-visible {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2),
    0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
}

.button:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3),
    0 10px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}

/* Hero */

.hero {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding-top: 4.5rem;
  padding-bottom: 3rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.hero__background {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  z-index: -2;
}

.hero__video {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  opacity: 0.55;
}

.hero__gradient {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(
      circle at top,
      rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2),
      transparent 55%
    ),
    radial-gradient(circle at bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.hero__overlay {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.hero__content {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 1.8rem 1.5rem 1.7rem;
}

.hero__eyebrow {
  margin: 0 0 0.6rem;
  font-size: 0.78rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.2em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
}

.hero__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.6rem;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.hero__title-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
  text-shadow: 0 0 18px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
}

.hero__subtitle {
  margin: 0 0 1.4rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.hero__cta-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.7rem;
}

.hero__stats {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1.25rem;
  margin: 0;
}

.hero__stat {
  flex: 1;
}

.hero__stat-number {
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
  margin-bottom: 0.15rem;
}

.hero__stat-label {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.hero__scroll-hint {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0 1.25rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.4rem;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.hero__scroll-icon {
  width: 1.3rem;
  height: 2.3rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  position: relative;
}

.hero__scroll-icon::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0.35rem;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0.18rem;
  height: 0.55rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: var(--color-primary-neon);
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  animation: hero-scroll 1.6s infinite;
}

@keyframes hero-scroll {
  0% {
    transform: translate(-50%, 0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(-50%, 0.7rem);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

.hero__scroll-text {
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* About */

.about__grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1.1fr);
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.about__figure {
  padding: 1rem;
}

.about__photo-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.about__photo {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  object-fit: cover;
  filter: saturate(1.1);
}

.about__badge {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0.9rem 0.9rem auto;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.about__caption {
  margin-top: 0.8rem;
}

.about__name {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.about__role {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.about__content {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.35rem;
}

.about__text {
  margin: 0 0 0.8rem;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.about__stats {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem;
  margin: 1rem 0 0;
}

.about__stat {
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
}

.about__stat-label {
  margin: 0 0 0.15rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.about__stat-value {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Services */

.services__carousel {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding-bottom: 2.5rem;
}

.services__track {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.9rem;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
}

.services__track::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none;
}

.services__card {
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  flex: 0 0 86%;
  padding: 1.25rem 1.1rem 1.3rem;
  position: relative;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform var(--transition-med),
    box-shadow var(--transition-med), border-color var(--transition-med);
}

.services__card::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.25),
    transparent 60%
  );
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity var(--transition-med);
}

.services__card:hover,
.services__card--active {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__card:hover::after,
.services__card--active::after {
  opacity: 1;
}

.services__icon {
  width: 2.6rem;
  height: 2.6rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-bottom: 0.85rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9)
  );
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__icon svg {
  width: 1.5rem;
  height: 1.5rem;
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.services__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.4rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.services__text {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.services__controls {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0.25rem 0.3rem;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.6rem;
}

.services__control {
  width: 0.5rem;
  height: 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: none;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background var(--transition-fast),
    transform var(--transition-fast), width var(--transition-fast);
}

.services__control--active {
  width: 1.35rem;
  background: var(--color-primary-neon);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__note {
  margin-top: 1rem;
  padding: 0.85rem 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

/* Contact */

.contact__grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr);
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact__info,
.contact__form-wrapper {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.3rem;
}

.contact__subtitle {
  margin: 0 0 0.9rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.contact__list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0 0 1rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.85rem;
}

.contact__item {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.7rem;
}

.contact__icon {
  width: 2.1rem;
  height: 2.1rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact__icon svg {
  width: 1.1rem;
  height: 1.1rem;
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.contact__body {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact__label {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.08em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.contact__value {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
}

.contact__link {
  display: inline-flex;
  margin-top: 0.05rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact__link:hover,
.contact__link:focus-visible {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.contact__social {
  margin-top: 0.6rem;
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.6rem;
}

.contact__social-link {
  width: 2.1rem;
  height: 2.1rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), transform var(--transition-fast),
    background var(--transition-fast);
}

.contact__social-link:hover,
.contact__social-link:focus-visible {
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95)
  );
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.contact__social-icon {
  width: 1.1rem;
  height: 1.1rem;
  border-radius: 0.4rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 30% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
}

.contact__social-icon--vk {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #4c75a3, #2a5885);
}

.contact__social-icon--wa {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #25d366, #128c7e);
}

.contact__social-icon--tg {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #2aabee, #0088cc);
}

.contact__form {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.85rem;
}

.contact__field {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.35rem;
}

.contact__label {
  margin: 0;
}

.contact__input {
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.16);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  padding: 0.7rem 0.8rem;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  min-height: 2.7rem;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast);
}

.contact__input--textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 4.5rem;
}

.contact__input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3);
}

.contact__input--invalid {
  border-color: rgba(255, 82, 82, 0.9);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(255, 82, 82, 0.5);
}

.contact__error {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.contact__note {
  margin: 0.25rem 0 0;
  font-size: 0.78rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.contact__success {
  margin: 0.4rem 0 0;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
}

.contact__map {
  margin-top: 1.75rem;
  padding: 0.4rem;
}

.contact__map iframe {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 14rem;
  border: none;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  filter: grayscale(0.4) contrast(1.05) saturate(1.2);
}

/* Footer */

.footer {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #000000, #050505);
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
}

.footer__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.footer__copy {
  margin: 0 0 0.2rem;
}

.footer__meta {
  margin: 0;
}

/* Loader */

.loader {
  pointer-events: none;
  position: fixed;
  inset: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: radial-gradient(circle at top, #121212, #000000 55%, #000000);
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: opacity 0.4s ease-out, visibility 0.4s ease-out;
}

.loader--hidden {
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
}

.loader__logo {
  position: relative;
  width: 3.75rem;
  height: 3.75rem;
  border-radius: 1.4rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 25% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
}

.loader__icon {
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: #000;
}

.loader__ring {
  position: absolute;
  inset: -0.5rem;
  border-radius: inherit;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  border-top-color: transparent;
  border-left-color: transparent;
  animation: loader-rotate 1.4s linear infinite;
}

.loader__text {
  margin-top: 0.9rem;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.2em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

@keyframes loader-rotate {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Scroll animations (basic, JS will enhance) */

[data-section] {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease-out, transform 0.5s ease-out;
}

[data-section].is-hidden {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(20px);
}

[data-section].is-visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

/* Utilities */

.visually-hidden {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border: 0;
}

/* Responsive (mobile-first) */

@media (min-width: 640px) {

  .header {
    padding-top: 0.8rem;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 2.6rem;
  }

  .hero__cta-group {
    flex-direction: row;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .about__grid {
    grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 0.9fr) minmax(0, 1.1fr);
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .about__stats {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  }

  .contact__grid {
    grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1.1fr) minmax(0, 1.1fr);
  }
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .header__inner {
    padding-inline: 1rem;
  }

  .header__burger {
    display: none;
  }

  .nav {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: auto;
  }

  .nav__list {
    padding: 0;
    gap: 0.4rem;
  }

  .nav__item {
    flex: 0;
  }

  .nav__link {
    width: 2.6rem;
    height: 2.6rem;
  }

  .hero {
    padding-top: 5.2rem;
  }

  .hero__content {
    padding: 2.1rem 2.1rem 2.2rem;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 3.1rem;
  }

  .hero__subtitle {
    font-size: 1rem;
    max-width: 30rem;
  }

  .services__track {
    gap: 1.1rem;
  }

  .services__card {
    flex: 0 0 calc(33.333% - 0.8rem);
  }

  .contact__map iframe {
    min-height: 16rem;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .section {
    padding-inline: 1.5rem;
    padding-block: 5rem;
  }

  .section__header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-end;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .section__subtitle {
    max-width: 24rem;
    text-align: right;
  }

  .hero__content {
    max-width: 980px;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 3.4rem;
  }

  .hero__subtitle {
    max-width: 32rem;
  }

  .hero__stats {
    max-width: 24rem;
  }

  .contact__map iframe {
    min-height: 18rem;
  }
}

```css
:root {
  /* Colors */
  --color-bg-main: #000000;
  --color-bg-deep: #0a0a0a;
  --color-bg-soft: #121212;
  --color-glass: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  --color-glass-strong: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-border-soft: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  --color-border-strong: rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.6);
  --color-primary: #00c853;
  --color-primary-soft: #00e676;
  --color-primary-alt: #64dd17;
  --color-primary-neon: #00ff88;
  --color-text-main: #f5f5f5;
  --color-text-muted: #a3a3a3;
  --color-error: #ff5252;

  /* Typography */
  --font-main: "Inter", system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI",
    sans-serif;
  --font-accent: "Montserrat", system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,
    "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
  --font-size-base: 16px;

  /* Layout */
  --container-width: 1120px;
  --section-padding-y: 4rem;
  --radius-lg: 1.5rem;
  --radius-md: 1rem;
  --radius-full: 999px;

  /* Effects */
  --shadow-soft: 0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  --shadow-neon: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4);
  --blur-strong: 18px;
  --blur-soft: 12px;

  /* Animation */
  --transition-fast: 0.18s ease-out;
  --transition-med: 0.28s ease-out;
}

*,
*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body.page {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
  font-family: var(--font-main);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  background: radial-gradient(circle at top, #121212, #000000 45%, #000000)
    fixed;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
}

img {
  max-width: 100%;
  display: block;
}

button,
input,
textarea {
  font: inherit;
}

a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}

/* Page layout */

.page__skip-link {
  position: absolute;
  left: -999px;
  top: 0.5rem;
  background: var(--color-bg-soft);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  z-index: 1000;
}

.page__skip-link:focus {
  left: 0.75rem;
  outline: 1px solid var(--color-primary);
}

.section {
  padding: var(--section-padding-y) 1.25rem;
}

.section__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.section__header {
  margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  text-align: left;
}

.section__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.04em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.section__subtitle {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

/* Glass effect */

.glass {
  background: var(--color-glass);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border-soft);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-soft);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.glass::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.16),
    transparent 55%
  );
  opacity: 0.3;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.glass--strong {
  background: var(--color-glass-strong);
}

.glass--soft {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
}

@supports ((backdrop-filter: blur(12px)) or (-webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px))) {
  .glass {
    backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-soft));
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-soft));
  }

  .glass--strong {
    backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-strong));
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-strong));
  }
}

/* Header & navigation */

.header {
  position: fixed;
  inset: 0 0 auto;
  z-index: 900;
  padding: 0.7rem 0.75rem 0.9rem;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.header__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0.35rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.75);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.24);
  box-shadow: 0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.header__logo {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.55rem;
}

.header__logo-mark {
  width: 1.85rem;
  height: 1.85rem;
  border-radius: 0.65rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 30% 10%,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  color: #000;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.header__logo-text {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.header__burger {
  border: none;
  background: transparent;
  width: 2.5rem;
  height: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.25rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
}

.header__burger::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.header__burger-line {
  width: 1.2rem;
  height: 2px;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: linear-gradient(
    90deg,
    var(--color-primary),
    var(--color-primary-neon)
  );
  transition: transform var(--transition-fast), opacity var(--transition-fast),
    translate var(--transition-fast);
}

.header__burger-line:nth-child(2) {
  width: 1.2rem;
}

.header__burger-line:nth-child(3) {
  width: 0.85rem;
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(1) {
  transform: translateY(6px) rotate(45deg);
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(2) {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: scale(0);
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(3) {
  transform: translateY(-6px) rotate(-45deg);
  width: 1.2rem;
}

.nav {
  position: fixed;
  inset: auto 0 0;
  transform: translateY(100%);
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: opacity var(--transition-med), transform var(--transition-med);
}

.nav--open {
  transform: translateY(0);
  opacity: 1;
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.nav__list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0.3rem 1.25rem 1rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.nav__item {
  flex: 1;
}

.nav__link {
  display: inline-flex;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0.45rem 0.25rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background var(--transition-fast),
    border-color var(--transition-fast), transform var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast);
}

.nav__link--active {
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.25),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95)
  );
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.nav__icon {
  width: 1.7rem;
  height: 1.7rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.nav__icon svg {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  fill: var(--color-text-main);
}

.nav__link--active .nav__icon svg {
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

/* Buttons */

.button {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.35rem;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  background: rgba(18, 18, 18, 0.95);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.04em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  transition: transform var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast),
    border-color var(--transition-fast);
}

.button::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  padding: 1px;
  background: linear-gradient(
    120deg,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.9),
    rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.3),
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.9)
  );
  -webkit-mask:
    linear-gradient(#000 0 0) content-box,
    linear-gradient(#000 0 0);
  -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
  mask-composite: exclude;
  opacity: 0.8;
}

.button--primary {
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  color: #000;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.button--ghost {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
}

.button--full {
  width: 100%;
}

.button:hover,
.button:focus-visible {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2),
    0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
}

.button:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3),
    0 10px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}

/* Hero */

.hero {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding-top: 4.5rem;
  padding-bottom: 3rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.hero__background {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  z-index: -2;
}

.hero__video {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  opacity: 0.55;
}

.hero__gradient {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(
      circle at top,
      rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2),
      transparent 55%
    ),
    radial-gradient(circle at bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.hero__overlay {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.hero__content {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 1.8rem 1.5rem 1.7rem;
}

.hero__eyebrow {
  margin: 0 0 0.6rem;
  font-size: 0.78rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.2em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
}

.hero__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.6rem;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.hero__title-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
  text-shadow: 0 0 18px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
}

.hero__subtitle {
  margin: 0 0 1.4rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.hero__cta-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.7rem;
}

.hero__stats {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1.25rem;
  margin: 0;
}

.hero__stat {
  flex: 1;
}

.hero__stat-number {
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
  margin-bottom: 0.15rem;
}

.hero__stat-label {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.hero__scroll-hint {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0 1.25rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.4rem;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.hero__scroll-icon {
  width: 1.3rem;
  height: 2.3rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  position: relative;
}

.hero__scroll-icon::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0.35rem;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0.18rem;
  height: 0.55rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: var(--color-primary-neon);
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  animation: hero-scroll 1.6s infinite;
}

@keyframes hero-scroll {
  0% {
    transform: translate(-50%, 0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(-50%, 0.7rem);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

.hero__scroll-text {
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* About */

.about__grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1.1fr);
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.about__figure {
  padding: 1rem;
}

.about__photo-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.about__photo {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  object-fit: cover;
  filter: saturate(1.1);
}

.about__badge {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0.9rem 0.9rem auto;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.about__caption {
  margin-top: 0.8rem;
}

.about__name {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.about__role {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.about__content {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.35rem;
}

.about__text {
  margin: 0 0 0.8rem;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.about__stats {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem;
  margin: 1rem 0 0;
}

.about__stat {
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
}

.about__stat-label {
  margin: 0 0 0.15rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.about__stat-value {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Services */

.services__carousel {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding-bottom: 2.5rem;
}

.services__track {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.9rem;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
}

.services__track::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none;
}

.services__card {
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  flex: 0 0 86%;
  padding: 1.25rem 1.1rem 1.3rem;
  position: relative;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform var(--transition-med),
    box-shadow var(--transition-med), border-color var(--transition-med);
}

.services__card::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.25),
    transparent 60%
  );
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity var(--transition-med);
}

.services__card:hover,
.services__card--active {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__card:hover::after,
.services__card--active::after {
  opacity: 1;
}

.services__icon {
  width: 2.6rem;
  height: 2.6rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-bottom: 0.85rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9)
  );
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__icon svg {
  width: 1.5rem;
  height: 1.5rem;
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.services__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.4rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.services__text {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.services__controls {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0.25rem 0.3rem;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.6rem;
}

.services__control {
  width: 0.5rem;
  height: 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: none;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background var(--transition-fast),
    transform var(--transition-fast), width var(--transition-fast);
}

.services__control--active {
  width: 1.35rem;
  background: var(--color-primary-neon);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__note {
  margin-top: 1rem;
  padding: 0.85rem 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

/* Contact */

.contact__grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr);
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact__info,
.contact__form-wrapper {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.3rem;
}

.contact__subtitle {
  margin: 0 0 0.9rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.contact__list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0 0 1rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.85rem;
}

.contact__item {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.7rem;
}

.contact__icon {
  width: 2.1rem;
  height: 2.1rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact__icon svg {
  width: 1.1rem;
  height: 1.1rem;
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.contact__body {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact__label {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.08em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.contact__value {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
}

.contact__link {
  display: inline-flex;
  margin-top: 0.05rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact__link:hover,
.contact__link:focus-visible {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.contact__social {
  margin-top: 0.6rem;
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.6rem;
}

.contact__social-link {
  width: 2.1rem;
  height: 2.1rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), transform var(--transition-fast),
    background var(--transition-fast);
}

.contact__social-link:hover,
.contact__social-link:focus-visible {
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95)
  );
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.contact__social-icon {
  width: 1.1rem;
  height: 1.1rem;
  border-radius: 0.4rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 30% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
}

.contact__social-icon--vk {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #4c75a3, #2a5885);
}

.contact__social-icon--wa {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #25d366, #128c7e);
}

.contact__social-icon--tg {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #2aabee, #0088cc);
}

.contact__form {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.85rem;
}

.contact__field {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.35rem;
}

.contact__label {
  margin: 0;
}

.contact__input {
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.16);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  padding: 0.7rem 0.8rem;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  min-height: 2.7rem;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast);
}

.contact__input--textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 4.5rem;
}

.contact__input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3);
}

.contact__input--invalid {
  border-color: rgba(255, 82, 82, 0.9);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(255, 82, 82, 0.5);
}

.contact__error {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.contact__note {
  margin: 0.25rem 0 0;
  font-size: 0.78rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.contact__success {
  margin: 0.4rem 0 0;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
}

.contact__map {
  margin-top: 1.75rem;
  padding: 0.4rem;
}

.contact__map iframe {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 14rem;
  border: none;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  filter: grayscale(0.4) contrast(1.05) saturate(1.2);
}

/* Footer */

.footer {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #000000, #050505);
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
}

.footer__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.footer__copy {
  margin: 0 0 0.2rem;
}

.footer__meta {
  margin: 0;
}

/* Loader */

.loader {
  pointer-events: none;
  position: fixed;
  inset: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: radial-gradient(circle at top, #121212, #000000 55%, #000000);
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: opacity 0.4s ease-out, visibility 0.4s ease-out;
}

.loader--hidden {
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
}

.loader__logo {
  position: relative;
  width: 3.75rem;
  height: 3.75rem;
  border-radius: 1.4rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 25% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
}

.loader__icon {
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: #000;
}

.loader__ring {
  position: absolute;
  inset: -0.5rem;
  border-radius: inherit;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  border-top-color: transparent;
  border-left-color: transparent;
  animation: loader-rotate 1.4s linear infinite;
}

.loader__text {
  margin-top: 0.9rem;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.2em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

@keyframes loader-rotate {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Scroll animations (basic, JS will enhance) */

[data-section] {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease-out, transform 0.5s ease-out;
}

[data-section].is-hidden {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(20px);
}

[data-section].is-visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

/* Utilities */

.visually-hidden {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border: 0;
}

/* Responsive (mobile-first) */

@media (min-width: 640px) {

  .header {
    padding-top: 0.8rem;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 2.6rem;
  }

  .hero__cta-group {
    flex-direction: row;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .about__grid {
    grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 0.9fr) minmax(0, 1.1fr);
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .about__stats {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  }

  .contact__grid {
    grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1.1fr) minmax(0, 1.1fr);
  }
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .header__inner {
    padding-inline: 1rem;
  }

  .header__burger {
    display: none;
  }

  .nav {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: auto;
  }

  .nav__list {
    padding: 0;
    gap: 0.4rem;
  }

  .nav__item {
    flex: 0;
  }

  .nav__link {
    width: 2.6rem;
    height: 2.6rem;
  }

  .hero {
    padding-top: 5.2rem;
  }

  .hero__content {
    padding: 2.1rem 2.1rem 2.2rem;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 3.1rem;
  }

  .hero__subtitle {
    font-size: 1rem;
    max-width: 30rem;
  }

  .services__track {
    gap: 1.1rem;
  }

  .services__card {
    flex: 0 0 calc(33.333% - 0.8rem);
  }

  .contact__map iframe {
    min-height: 16rem;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .section {
    padding-inline: 1.5rem;
    padding-block: 5rem;
  }

  .section__header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-end;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .section__subtitle {
    max-width: 24rem;
    text-align: right;
  }

  .hero__content {
    max-width: 980px;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 3.4rem;
  }

  .hero__subtitle {
    max-width: 32rem;
  }

  .hero__stats {
    max-width: 24rem;
  }

  .contact__map iframe {
    min-height: 18rem;
  }
}

```css
:root {
  /* Colors */
  --color-bg-main: #000000;
  --color-bg-deep: #0a0a0a;
  --color-bg-soft: #121212;
  --color-glass: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  --color-glass-strong: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-border-soft: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  --color-border-strong: rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.6);
  --color-primary: #00c853;
  --color-primary-soft: #00e676;
  --color-primary-alt: #64dd17;
  --color-primary-neon: #00ff88;
  --color-text-main: #f5f5f5;
  --color-text-muted: #a3a3a3;
  --color-error: #ff5252;

  /* Typography */
  --font-main: "Inter", system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI",
    sans-serif;
  --font-accent: "Montserrat", system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont,
    "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
  --font-size-base: 16px;

  /* Layout */
  --container-width: 1120px;
  --section-padding-y: 4rem;
  --radius-lg: 1.5rem;
  --radius-md: 1rem;
  --radius-full: 999px;

  /* Effects */
  --shadow-soft: 0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  --shadow-neon: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4);
  --blur-strong: 18px;
  --blur-soft: 12px;

  /* Animation */
  --transition-fast: 0.18s ease-out;
  --transition-med: 0.28s ease-out;
}

*,
*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body.page {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
  font-family: var(--font-main);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  background: radial-gradient(circle at top, #121212, #000000 45%, #000000)
    fixed;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
}

img {
  max-width: 100%;
  display: block;
}

button,
input,
textarea {
  font: inherit;
}

a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}

/* Page layout */

.page__skip-link {
  position: absolute;
  left: -999px;
  top: 0.5rem;
  background: var(--color-bg-soft);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  z-index: 1000;
}

.page__skip-link:focus {
  left: 0.75rem;
  outline: 1px solid var(--color-primary);
}

.section {
  padding: var(--section-padding-y) 1.25rem;
}

.section__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.section__header {
  margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  text-align: left;
}

.section__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.04em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.section__subtitle {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

/* Glass effect */

.glass {
  background: var(--color-glass);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border-soft);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-soft);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.glass::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.16),
    transparent 55%
  );
  opacity: 0.3;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.glass--strong {
  background: var(--color-glass-strong);
}

.glass--soft {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
}

@supports ((backdrop-filter: blur(12px)) or (-webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px))) {
  .glass {
    backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-soft));
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-soft));
  }

  .glass--strong {
    backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-strong));
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--blur-strong));
  }
}

/* Header & navigation */

.header {
  position: fixed;
  inset: 0 0 auto;
  z-index: 900;
  padding: 0.7rem 0.75rem 0.9rem;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.header__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0.35rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.75);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.24);
  box-shadow: 0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.header__logo {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.55rem;
}

.header__logo-mark {
  width: 1.85rem;
  height: 1.85rem;
  border-radius: 0.65rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 30% 10%,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  color: #000;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.header__logo-text {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.header__burger {
  border: none;
  background: transparent;
  width: 2.5rem;
  height: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.25rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
}

.header__burger::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.header__burger-line {
  width: 1.2rem;
  height: 2px;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: linear-gradient(
    90deg,
    var(--color-primary),
    var(--color-primary-neon)
  );
  transition: transform var(--transition-fast), opacity var(--transition-fast),
    translate var(--transition-fast);
}

.header__burger-line:nth-child(2) {
  width: 1.2rem;
}

.header__burger-line:nth-child(3) {
  width: 0.85rem;
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(1) {
  transform: translateY(6px) rotate(45deg);
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(2) {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: scale(0);
}

.header__burger--open .header__burger-line:nth-child(3) {
  transform: translateY(-6px) rotate(-45deg);
  width: 1.2rem;
}

.nav {
  position: fixed;
  top: 4.5rem;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  transform: translateY(-100%);
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: opacity var(--transition-med), transform var(--transition-med);
  z-index: 899;
  background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.2);
  box-shadow: 0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}

.nav--open {
  transform: translateY(0);
  opacity: 1;
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.nav__list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0.3rem 1.25rem 1rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.nav__item {
  flex: 1;
}

.nav__link {
  display: inline-flex;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0.45rem 0.25rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background var(--transition-fast),
    border-color var(--transition-fast), transform var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast);
}

.nav__link--active {
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.25),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95)
  );
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.nav__icon {
  width: 1.7rem;
  height: 1.7rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.nav__icon svg {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  fill: var(--color-text-main);
}

.nav__link--active .nav__icon svg {
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

/* Buttons */

.button {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.35rem;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  background: rgba(18, 18, 18, 0.95);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.04em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  transition: transform var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast),
    border-color var(--transition-fast);
}

.button::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  padding: 1px;
  background: linear-gradient(
    120deg,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.9),
    rgba(0, 200, 83, 0.3),
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.9)
  );
  -webkit-mask:
    linear-gradient(#000 0 0) content-box,
    linear-gradient(#000 0 0);
  -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
  mask-composite: exclude;
  opacity: 0.8;
}

.button--primary {
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  color: #000;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.button--ghost {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
}

.button--full {
  width: 100%;
}

.button:hover,
.button:focus-visible {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2),
    0 18px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
}

.button:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3),
    0 10px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}

/* Hero */

.hero {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding-top: 4.5rem;
  padding-bottom: 3rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.hero__background {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  z-index: -2;
}

.hero__video {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  opacity: 0.55;
}

.hero__gradient {
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(
      circle at top,
      rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2),
      transparent 55%
    ),
    radial-gradient(circle at bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.hero__overlay {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.hero__content {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 1.8rem 1.5rem 1.7rem;
}

.hero__eyebrow {
  margin: 0 0 0.6rem;
  font-size: 0.78rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.2em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
}

.hero__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.6rem;
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.hero__title-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
  text-shadow: 0 0 18px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
}

.hero__subtitle {
  margin: 0 0 1.4rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.hero__cta-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.7rem;
}

.hero__stats {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1.25rem;
  margin: 0;
}

.hero__stat {
  flex: 1;
}

.hero__stat-number {
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
  margin-bottom: 0.15rem;
}

.hero__stat-label {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.hero__scroll-hint {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0 1.25rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.4rem;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.hero__scroll-icon {
  width: 1.3rem;
  height: 2.3rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  position: relative;
}

.hero__scroll-icon::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0.35rem;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0.18rem;
  height: 0.55rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: var(--color-primary-neon);
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  animation: hero-scroll 1.6s infinite;
}

@keyframes hero-scroll {
  0% {
    transform: translate(-50%, 0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(-50%, 0.7rem);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

.hero__scroll-text {
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* About */

.about__grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1.1fr);
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.about__figure {
  padding: 1rem;
}

.about__photo-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.about__photo {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  object-fit: cover;
  filter: saturate(1.1);
}

.about__badge {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0.9rem 0.9rem auto;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  color: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.about__caption {
  margin-top: 0.8rem;
}

.about__name {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.about__role {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.about__content {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.35rem;
}

.about__text {
  margin: 0 0 0.8rem;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.about__stats {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem;
  margin: 1rem 0 0;
}

.about__stat {
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
}

.about__stat-label {
  margin: 0 0 0.15rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.about__stat-value {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Services */

.services__carousel {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding-bottom: 2.5rem;
}

.services__track {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.9rem;
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
}

.services__track::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none;
}

.services__card {
  scroll-snap-align: center;
  flex: 0 0 86%;
  padding: 1.25rem 1.1rem 1.3rem;
  position: relative;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform var(--transition-med),
    box-shadow var(--transition-med), border-color var(--transition-med);
}

.services__card::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at top,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.25),
    transparent 60%
  );
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity var(--transition-med);
}

.services__card:hover,
.services__card--active {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__card:hover::after,
.services__card--active::after {
  opacity: 1;
}

.services__icon {
  width: 2.6rem;
  height: 2.6rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-bottom: 0.85rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9)
  );
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__icon svg {
  width: 1.5rem;
  height: 1.5rem;
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.services__title {
  margin: 0 0 0.4rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.services__text {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.services__controls {
  position: absolute;
  inset: auto 0.25rem 0.3rem;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.6rem;
}

.services__control {
  width: 0.5rem;
  height: 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: none;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background var(--transition-fast),
    transform var(--transition-fast), width var(--transition-fast);
}

.services__control--active {
  width: 1.35rem;
  background: var(--color-primary-neon);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
}

.services__note {
  margin-top: 1rem;
  padding: 0.85rem 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

/* Contact */

.contact__grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr);
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact__info,
.contact__form-wrapper {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.3rem;
}

.contact__subtitle {
  margin: 0 0 0.9rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.contact__list {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0 0 1rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.85rem;
}

.contact__item {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.7rem;
}

.contact__icon {
  width: 2.1rem;
  height: 2.1rem;
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact__icon svg {
  width: 1.1rem;
  height: 1.1rem;
  fill: var(--color-primary-neon);
}

.contact__body {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact__label {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.08em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.contact__value {
  margin: 0 0 0.1rem;
}

.contact__link {
  display: inline-flex;
  margin-top: 0.05rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact__link:hover,
.contact__link:focus-visible {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.contact__social {
  margin-top: 0.6rem;
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.6rem;
}

.contact__social-link {
  width: 2.1rem;
  height: 2.1rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), transform var(--transition-fast),
    background var(--transition-fast);
}

.contact__social-link:hover,
.contact__social-link:focus-visible {
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 20% 0,
    rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.4),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95)
  );
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-neon);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.contact__social-icon {
  width: 1.1rem;
  height: 1.1rem;
  border-radius: 0.4rem;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 30% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
}

.contact__social-icon--vk {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #4c75a3, #2a5885);
}

.contact__social-icon--wa {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #25d366, #128c7e);
}

.contact__social-icon--tg {
  background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0, #2aabee, #0088cc);
}

.contact__form {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.85rem;
}

.contact__field {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.35rem;
}

.contact__label {
  margin: 0;
}

.contact__input {
  border-radius: 0.9rem;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.16);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  padding: 0.7rem 0.8rem;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  min-height: 2.7rem;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast),
    box-shadow var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast);
}

.contact__input--textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 4.5rem;
}

.contact__input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3);
}

.contact__input--invalid {
  border-color: rgba(255, 82, 82, 0.9);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(255, 82, 82, 0.5);
}

.contact__error {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.contact__note {
  margin: 0.25rem 0 0;
  font-size: 0.78rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.contact__success {
  margin: 0.4rem 0 0;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: var(--color-primary-soft);
}

.contact__map {
  margin-top: 1.75rem;
  padding: 0.4rem;
}

.contact__map iframe {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 14rem;
  border: none;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  filter: grayscale(0.4) contrast(1.05) saturate(1.2);
}

/* Footer */

.footer {
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem 1.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #000000, #050505);
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
}

.footer__inner {
  max-width: var(--container-width);
  margin: 0 auto;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.footer__copy {
  margin: 0 0 0.2rem;
}

.footer__meta {
  margin: 0;
}

/* Loader */

.loader {
  pointer-events: none;
  position: fixed;
  inset: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: radial-gradient(circle at top, #121212, #000000 55%, #000000);
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: opacity 0.4s ease-out, visibility 0.4s ease-out;
}

.loader--hidden {
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
}

.loader__logo {
  position: relative;
  width: 3.75rem;
  height: 3.75rem;
  border-radius: 1.4rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle at 25% 0,
    var(--color-primary-neon),
    var(--color-primary)
  );
  box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
}

.loader__icon {
  font-family: var(--font-accent);
  font-weight: 800;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: #000;
}

.loader__ring {
  position: absolute;
  inset: -0.5rem;
  border-radius: inherit;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.7);
  border-top-color: transparent;
  border-left-color: transparent;
  animation: loader-rotate 1.4s linear infinite;
}

.loader__text {
  margin-top: 0.9rem;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.2em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

@keyframes loader-rotate {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Scroll animations (basic, JS will enhance) */

[data-section] {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease-out, transform 0.5s ease-out;
}

[data-section].is-hidden {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(20px);
}

[data-section].is-visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

/* Utilities */

.visually-hidden {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border: 0;
}

/* Responsive (mobile-first) */

@media (min-width: 640px) {

  .header {
    padding-top: 0.8rem;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 2.6rem;
  }

  .hero__cta-group {
    flex-direction: row;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .about__grid {
    grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 0.9fr) minmax(0, 1.1fr);
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .about__stats {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
  }

  .contact__grid {
    grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1.1fr) minmax(0, 1.1fr);
  }
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .header__inner {
    padding-inline: 1rem;
  }

  .header__burger {
    display: none;
  }

  .nav {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: auto;
  }

  .nav__list {
    padding: 0;
    gap: 0.4rem;
  }

  .nav__item {
    flex: 0;
  }

  .nav__link {
    width: 2.6rem;
    height: 2.6rem;
  }

  .hero {
    padding-top: 5.2rem;
  }

  .hero__content {
    padding: 2.1rem 2.1rem 2.2rem;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 3.1rem;
  }

  .hero__subtitle {
    font-size: 1rem;
    max-width: 30rem;
  }

  .services__track {
    gap: 1.1rem;
  }

  .services__card {
    flex: 0 0 calc(33.333% - 0.8rem);
  }

  .contact__map iframe {
    min-height: 16rem;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .section {
    padding-inline: 1.5rem;
    padding-block: 5rem;
  }

  .section__header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-end;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .section__subtitle {
    max-width: 24rem;
    text-align: right;
  }

  .hero__content {
    max-width: 980px;
  }

  .hero__title {
    font-size: 3.4rem;
  }

  .hero__subtitle {
    max-width: 32rem;
  }

  .hero__stats {
    max-width: 24rem;
  }

  .contact__map iframe {
    min-height: 18rem;
  }
}
